sa māgadhānām pravaraḥ ṅkuśa grahaḥ
graheṣu asahyaḥ vikacaḥ yathā grahaḥ
sapatna senām pramamātha dāruṇaḥ
mahīm samagrām vikacaḥ yathā grahaḥ
su kalpitam dānava nāga saṃnibham
mahā abhra saṃhrādam amitra mardanam
ratha aśva mātaṅga gaṇān sahasraśas
samāsthitaḥ hanti śaraiḥ dvipān api
rathān adhiṣṭhāya sa vāji sārathīn
rathān ca padbhiḥ tvaritaḥ vyapothayat

original: 08,013.007c dvipāṃś ca padbhyāṃ caraṇaiḥ kareṇa ca;

dvipa āsthitaḥ hanti sa kālacakra vat
sa nāga yantṝn samare mahā rathān
sa patti saṃghān turagān sa sādinaḥ
dvipān ca bāṇaiḥ nijaghāna vīryavān
samantataḥ ghnan iva kālacakra vat
narān ca kārṣṇāyasa varma bhūṣaṇān
nipātya sa aśvān api pattibhiḥ saha
vyapothayat danti vareṇa śuṣmiṇā
sa śabda vat sthūla naḍān yathā tathā
atha arjunaḥ jyā tala nemi nisvane
mṛdaṅga bherī bahu śaṅkha nādite
nara aśva mātaṅga sahasra nāditaiḥ
ratha uttamena abhyapatat dvipa uttamam
tatas rjunam dvādaśabhiḥ śara uttamaiḥ
janārdanam ṣoḍaśabhiḥ samārdayat
sa daṇḍadhāraḥ turagān tribhiḥ tribhiḥ
tatas nanāda prajahāsa ca asakṛt
tatas sya pārthaḥ sa guṇa iṣu kārmukam
cakarta bhallaiḥ dhvajam api alaṃkṛtam
punar niyantṝn saha pāda goptṛbhiḥ
tatas tu cukrodha girivraja īśvaraḥ
tatas rjunam bhinna kaṭena dantinā
ghanāghanena anila tulya raṃhasā
atīva cukṣobhayiṣuḥ janārdanam
dhanaṃjayam ca abhijaghāna tomaraiḥ
atha asya bāhū dvipa hasta saṃnibhau
śiraḥ ca pūrṇa indu nibha ānanam tribhiḥ
kṣuraiḥ praciccheda saha eva pāṇḍavaḥ
tatas dvipam bāṇa śataiḥ samārdayat
sa pārtha bāṇaiḥ tapanīya bhūṣaṇaiḥ
samārucat kāñcana varma bhṛt dvipaḥ
tathā cakāśe niśi parvataḥ yathā
dava agninā prajvalita oṣadhi drumaḥ
sa vedanā ārtaḥ mbuda nisvanaḥ nadan
calan bhraman praskhalitaḥ turaḥ dravan
papāta rugṇaḥ sa niyantṛkaḥ tathā
yathā giriḥ vajra nipāta cūrṇitaḥ
hima avadātena suvarṇa mālinā
himādri kūṭa pratimena dantinā
hate raṇe bhrātari daṇḍaḥ āvrajat
jighāṃsuḥ indra avarajam dhanaṃjayam
sa tomaraiḥ arka kara prabhaiḥ tribhiḥ
janārdanam pañcabhiḥ eva ca arjunam
samarpayitvā vinanāda ca ardayan
tatas sya bāhū vicakarta pāṇḍavaḥ
kṣura prakṛttau su bhṛśam sa tomarau
cyuta aṅgadau candana rūṣitau bhujau
gajāt patantau yugapad virejatuḥ
yathā adri śṛṅgāt patitau mahā uragau
atha ardhacandreṇa hṛtam kirīṭinā
papāta daṇḍasya śiraḥ kṣitim dvipāt
tat śoṇita ābham nipatat vireje
divākarā u stāt iva paścimām diśam
atha dvipam śveta naga agra saṃnibham
divākara aṃśu pratimaiḥ śara uttamaiḥ
bibheda pārthaḥ sa papāta nānadan
himādri kūṭaḥ kuliśa āhataḥ yathā

original: 08,045.025a tato yodhair mahārāja palāyadbhis tatas tataḥ

original: 08,045.028a tato duryodhanaḥ karṇam abravīt praṇayād iva
analyzed: tatas duryodhanaḥ karṇam abravīt praṇayāt iva

original: 08,045.036c saṃchannā pāṇḍavī senā na prājñāyata kiṃ cana

analyzed: duḥsahaḥ vajriṇā api ājau parājitya guroḥ sutam
athā bravīt vāsudevam kuntī putraḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 08,045.046c naitad astraṃ hi samare śakyaṃ hantuṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na etat astram hi samare śakyam hantum katham cana

original: 08,045.047a sūtaputraṃ ca saṃrabdhaṃ paśya kṛṣṇa mahāraṇe

original: 08,045.048a sutīkṣṇaṃ codayann aśvān prekṣate māṃ muhur muhuḥ

analyzed: karṇena hi dṛḍham rājā kuntī putraḥ parikṣataḥ

original: 08,045.051a arjunaṃ cābravīt kṛṣṇo bhṛśaṃ rājā parikṣataḥ

original: 08,045.053c sainyam ālokayām āsa nāpaśyat tatra cāgrajam

original: 08,045.054c duḥsahaṃ vajriṇā saṃkhye parājigye bhṛgoḥ sutam
analyzed: duḥsaham vajriṇā saṃkhye parājigye bhṛgoḥ sutam
drauṇim parājitya tatas ugradhanvā
kṛtvā mahat duṣkaram ārya karma
ālokayām āsa tatas sva sainyam
dhanaṃjayaḥ śatrubhiḥ apradhṛṣyaḥ
sa yudhyamānaḥ pṛtanā mukha sthān
śūrām śūraḥ harṣayan savyasācī
pūrva apadānaiḥ prathitaiḥ praśaṃsan
sthirān cakāra ātma rathān anīke
apaśyamānaḥ tu kirīṭamālī
yudhi jyeṣṭham bhrātaram ājamīḍham
uvāca bhīmam tarasā abhyupetya

original: rājñaḥ pravṛttis tv iha keti rājan
analyzed: rājñaḥ pravṛttiḥ tu iha kā iti rājan
bhīmaḥ uvāca
apayātaḥ itas rājā dharmaputraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
karṇa bāṇa vibhugna aṅgaḥ yadi jīvet katham cana
arjunaḥ uvāca
tasmāt bhavām śīghram itas prayātu
rājñaḥ pravṛttyai kuru sattamasya
nūnam hi viddhaḥ u ti bhṛśam pṛṣatkaiḥ
karṇena rājā śibiram gataḥ sau
yaḥ saṃprahāre niśi saṃpravṛtte
droṇena viddhaḥ u ti bhṛśam tarasvī
tasthau ca tatra api jayapratīkṣaḥ
droṇena yāvat na hataḥ kila āsīt
sa saṃśayam gamitaḥ pāṇḍava agryaḥ
saṃkhye karṇena mahā anubhāvaḥ

original: 08,045.061c jñātuṃ prayāhy āśu tam adya bhīma;
analyzed: jñātum prayāhi āśu tam adya bhīma
sthāsyāmi aham śatru gaṇān nirudhya
bhīmaḥ uvāca
tvam eva jānīhi mahā anubhāva
rājñaḥ pravṛttim bharata ṛṣabhasya

original: 08,045.062c ahaṃ hi yady arjuna yāmi tatra;
analyzed: aham hi yadi arjuna yāmi tatra
vakṣyanti mām bhītaḥ iti pravīrāḥ
tatas bravīt arjunaḥ bhīmasenam
saṃśaptakāḥ pratyanīkam sthitāḥ me

original: 08,045.063c etān ahatvā na mayā tu śakyam;
analyzed: etān a hatvā na mayā tu śakyam
itas payātum ripu saṃgha goṣṭhāt
atha abravīt arjunam bhīmasenaḥ
sva vīryam āśritya kuru pravīra
saṃśaptakān pratiyotsyāmi saṃkhye
sarvān aham yāhi dhanaṃjaya iti
tat bhīmasenasya vacaḥ niśamya
su durvacam bhrātuḥ amitra madhye
saṃśaptaka anīkam asahyam ekaḥ
su duṣkaram dhārayāmi iti pārthaḥ
uvāca nārāyaṇam aprameyam
kapidhvajaḥ satya parākramasya
śrutvā vacaḥ bhrātuḥ adīna sattvaḥ
tadā āhave satyavacaḥ mahātmā

original: 08,045.065d*0638_01 rājānaṃ prati vārṣṇeya dūyate me dṛḍhaṃ manaḥ

original: 08,045.066d*0639_01 taṃ rathaṃ codayām āsa bībhatsor vacanād dhariḥ
analyzed: tam ratham codayām āsa bībhatsoḥ vacanāt hariḥ
tatas hayān sarva dāśārha mukhyaḥ

yāsyāmahe jahi bhīma ari saṃghān

original: 08,045.068a tato yayau hṛṣīkeśo yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: tatas yayau hṛṣīkeśaḥ yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 08,045.069c saṃdiśya caiva rājendra yuddhaṃ prati vṛkodaram
analyzed: saṃdiśya ca eva rāja indra yuddham prati vṛkodaram
kṣaṇena eva tu rājānam āsedatuḥ ariṃdamau

rājānam āsādya śayānam ekam
rathāt ubhau pratyavaruhya tasmāt
vavandatuḥ dharmarājasya pādau
javena gatvā tu dāśārha mukhyaḥ
śayānam ekam kuru rājam dadarśa
praharṣa vega īrita mānasau ubhau
rājānam āsādya parisravat vraṇam

original: 08,045.070d*0642_01 ity evam abhisaṃgṛhya ubhau tu prāñjalī sthitau
analyzed: iti evam abhisaṃgṛhya ubhau tu prāñjalī sthitau
śastra kṣatau mahā rāja rudhireṇa samukṣitau
nihatya vāhinīm tubhyam apayātau raṇa ajirāt
tau dṛṣṭvā puruṣa vyāghrau kṣemiṇau puruṣa ṛṣabha
mudā abhyupagatau kṛṣṇau aśvinau iva vāsavam

original: 08,045.072a tāv abhyanandad rājā hi vivasvān aśvināv iva
analyzed: tau abhyanandat rājā hi vivasvān aśvinau iva

original: 08,045.072c hate mahāsure jambhe śakraviṣṇū yathā guruḥ
analyzed: hate mahā asure jambhe śakra viṣṇū yathā guruḥ
manyamānaḥ hatam karṇam dharmarājaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
prītaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
sa bhūtvā puruṣa vyāghrau
harṣa gadgadayā vācā prītaḥ prāha paraṃtapau
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
atha upayātau pṛthu lohita akṣau
śara ācita aṅgau rudhira pradigdhau
yudhiṣṭhirasya prativedayantau
priyam tadānīm puruṣa pravīrau
tau āgatau prekṣya mahā indra kalpau
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ duḥkha parīta cetāḥ
kṛcchreṇa rājā pratilabhya saṃjñām
tatas punar prīta manāḥ babhūva

tatas sya pādau abhivādya paścāt
chamam brūyāḥ sāntva pūrvam ca pārtham

original: 08,049.071a bhrātā prājñas tava kopaṃ na jātu;
analyzed: bhrātā prājñaḥ tava kopam na jātu
kuryāt rājā kam cana pāṇḍaveyaḥ
muktaḥ nṛtāt bhrātṛ vadhāt ca pārtha
hṛṣṭaḥ karṇam tvam jahi sūtaputram
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
iti evam uktaḥ tu janārdanena
pārthaḥ praśasya atha suhṛd vadham tam
tatas bravīt arjunaḥ dharmarājam
an ukta pūrvam paruṣam prasahya
mā tvam rājan vyāhara vyāharatsu
na tiṣṭhase krośa mātre raṇa ardhe

original: 08,049.073b*0716_01 mā vocas tvaṃ kiṃ cid ihādya rājaṃs
analyzed: mā vocaḥ tvam kim cit iha adya rājan

original: 08,049.073b*0716_02 tyaktvā yuddhaṃ ya iha vyavasthitas tvam
analyzed: tyaktvā yuddham yaḥ iha vyavasthitaḥ tvam
bhīmaḥ tu mām arhati garhaṇāya
yaḥ yudhyate sarva yodha pravīraḥ
kāle hi śatrūn pratipīḍya saṃkhye
hatvā ca śūrān pṛthivīpatīn tān
ratha pradhāna uttama nāga mukhyān
sādi pravekān amitān ca śūrān
yaḥ kuñjarāṇām adhikam sahasram
hatvā anadat tumulam siṃhanādam
kāmbojānām ayuta pārvatīyān
mṛgān siṃhaḥ vinihatya iva ca ājau
su duṣkaram karma karoti vīraḥ

original: kartuṃ yathā nārhasi tvaṃ kadā cit
analyzed: kartum yathā na arhasi tvam kadā cit
rathāt avaplutya gadām parāmṛśan
tayā nihanti aśva nara dvipān raṇe
vara asinā vāji ratha aśva kuñjarān

original: tathā rathāṅgair dhanuṣā ca hanty arīn
analyzed: tathā rathāṅgaiḥ dhanuṣā ca hanti arīn
pramṛdya padbhyām ahitān nihanti yaḥ
punar ca dorbhyām śatamanyu vikramaḥ
prasahya hantā dviṣatām yathārham
sa bhīmasenaḥ rhati garhaṇām me

original: na tvaṃ nityaṃ rakṣyase yaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ
analyzed: na tvam nityam rakṣyase yaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ
mahā rathān nāga varān hayān ca
padāti mukhyān api ca pramathya
ekaḥ bhīmaḥ dhārtarāṣṭreṣu magnaḥ
sa mām upālabdhum ariṃdamaḥ rhati
kaliṅga vaṅga aṅga niṣāda māgadhān
sadāmadān nīla balāhaka upamān
nihanti yaḥ śatru gaṇān anekaśas
sa mā abhivaktum prabhavati anāgasam
su yuktam āsthāya ratham hi kāle
dhanuḥ vikarṣam śara pūrṇa muṣṭiḥ
sṛjati asau śara varṣāṇi vīro
mahā āhave meghaḥ iva ambu dhārāḥ
śatāni aṣṭau vāraṇānām apaśyam
viśātitaiḥ kumbhakara agra hastaiḥ
bhīmena ājau nihatāni adya bāṇaiḥ

original: 08,049.080d*0720_02 sa māṃ krūraṃ vaktum arhaty arighnaḥ
analyzed: sa mām krūram vaktum arhati ari ghnaḥ
mahā rathānām ayutam su pūrṇam
atha aśvānām ayutāni ṣaḍ ca
padāti saṃghān bahuśas vimṛdya
vīrān hatvā
prāṇān tyaktvā dustyajān āji madhye
saṃyuddhe yaḥ vairibhiḥ bhīmasenaḥ
yaḥ bhīmasenaḥ nihata ari saṃghaḥ
sa mām upālabdhum ariṃdamaḥ rhati

original: 08,049.080d@021_0001 rathāś ca nāgāś ca hayāś ca rājan
analyzed: rathāḥ ca nāgāḥ ca hayāḥ ca rājan
bhīmena ājau nihatāḥ saṃghaśas
rājānaḥ ca bahavaḥ mahā balāḥ
sa mām upālabdhum ariṃdamaḥ rhati
dhṛtarāṣṭra putrāḥ balinaḥ ca yena
mahā balāḥ nihatāḥ prāyaśas vai
śūraḥ yuddheṣu a prativārya vīryaḥ
sa mām upālabdhum ariṃdamaḥ rhati
pratāpayan tat balam ugra rūpam
yaḥ sau raṇe dhārtarāṣṭrasya vīraḥ
ekaḥ saheta apratisahya pauruṣaḥ

original: 08,049.080d@021_0012 tenāsmi vācyo na tvayā vai kadā cit
analyzed: tena asmi vācyaḥ na tvayā vai kadā cit
mahā rathāḥ yatra yatra eva yuddhe
bhindanti sainyam tava kāmataḥ
tatra eva tatra eva raṇe mahātmā
dṛḍham bhīmaḥ para saṃghān amṛdnāt

original: 08,049.080d@021_0017 tenāsmi vācyo na tvayāhaṃ kadā cit
analyzed: tena asmi vācyaḥ na tvayā aham kadā cit

original: 08,049.080d@021_0018 mā mā vocaḥ krūram ihādya pārtha
analyzed: mā mā vocaḥ krūram iha adya pārtha
na asmadvidhaḥ vai bhavatā tu vācyaḥ
yathā bhavān sarva lokasya vācyaḥ

original: 08,049.080d@021_0021 evaṃ hi mā te bruvato narendra
analyzed: evam hi mā te bruvataḥ narendra
katham na dīryet śatadhā adya jihvā
aho bata idam su nṛśaṃsa rūpam

original: 08,049.080d@021_0024 bhavān api hy atra karṇād bibheti
analyzed: bhavān api hi atra karṇāt bibheti
balam tu vāci dvijasattamānām
kṣātram budhāḥ bāhu balam vadanti
tvam vāc balaḥ bhārata niṣṭhuraḥ ca
tvam eva mām vetsi yathāvidhaḥ ham
nakulena rājan gaja vāji yodhā
hatāḥ ca śūrāḥ sahasā sametya
tyaktvā prāṇān samare yuddha kāṅkṣī
sa mām upālabdhum ariṃdamaḥ rhati
kṛtam karma sahadevena duṣkaram
yaḥ yudhyate para sainya avamardī

original: 08,049.081d@022_0007 na cābravīt kiṃ cid ihāgato balī
analyzed: na ca abravīt kim cit iha āgataḥ balī
paśya antaram tasya ca eva ātmanaḥ ca
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ sātyakiḥ draupadeyā
yudhāmanyuḥ ca uttamaujāḥ śikhaṇḍī
ete dya sarve yudhi saṃprapīḍitāḥ

original: 08,049.081d@022_0012 te mām upālabdhum arhanti na tvam
analyzed: te mām upālabdhum arhanti na tvam
tvad mūlam asmābhiḥ idam hi vairam
prāptam tathā vyasanam ca ati ghoram
dyūte pramattena kṛtam tvayā asakṛt
kasmāt upālabdhum iha arhasi tvam
tvam eva rājan satatam pramattaḥ
tvam eva mūḍhaḥ bhāratānām asādhuḥ

original: 08,049.081d@022_0019 tvāṃ prāpya rājyaṃ ca vinaṣṭam etat
analyzed: tvām prāpya rājyam ca vinaṣṭam etat
prāptāḥ mahat pāṇḍavāḥ ca eva dāsyam
tvattaḥ kṛte syāt vana vāsa duḥkham

original: 08,049.081d@022_0022 rājyasya nāśo hy abhimanyoś ca ghoraḥ
analyzed: rājyasya nāśaḥ hi abhimanyoḥ ca ghoraḥ
ātmānam evam su nṛśaṃsa rūpam
jñātvā kimartham garhase mā adya vīra
lajjasva rājan yadi te sti lajjā

original: 08,049.081d@022_0026 tūṣṇīṃ bhūtaḥ paśya sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ naḥ
analyzed: tūṣṇīm bhūtaḥ paśya sarvam kṛtam naḥ
bhīmaḥ nityam samarasya kartā
darpasya bhettā punar eva nityam
svayam hi aśaktena narendra yuddhe
nareṇa kāryā satatam kṣamā eva
yatāmi nityam tava kartum iṣṭam
dāraiḥ sutaiḥ jīvitena ātmanā ca
evam ca mām vāc viśikhaiḥ nihaṃsi

original: tvattaḥ sukhaṃ na vayaṃ vidma kiṃ cit
analyzed: tvattaḥ sukham na vayam vidma kim cit
avāmaṃsthāḥ mām draupadī talpa saṃstho
mahā rathān pratihanmi tvad arthe
tena atiśaṅkī bhārata niṣṭhuraḥ si
tvattaḥ sukham na abhijānāmi kim cit
proktaḥ svayam satya saṃdhena mṛtyuḥ
tava priya artham naradeva yuddhe
vīraḥ śikhaṇḍī draupadaḥ sau mahātmā
mayā abhiguptena hataḥ ca tena
droṇaḥ hataḥ yaḥ satata upakārī
dhṛṣṭadyumnena syandanāt viprakṛṣya
drauṇiḥ ca kruddhaḥ sa gaṇaḥ mahātmā
tathā api te vai vacanam nṛśaṃsa vat
duḥkham priyam te naradeva kartum

original: 08,049.084d*0724_02 yasya priyaṃ te na karomy ahaṃ vai
analyzed: yasya priyam te na karomi aham vai

original: 08,049.084d*0724_03 na mucyate vai divi ceha vā pumān
analyzed: na mucyate vai divi ca iha vā pumān
yaḥ te mat anyo priyam ārabheta
na ca abhinandāmi tava adhirājyam
yatas tvam akṣeṣu ahitāya saktaḥ
svayam kṛtvā pāpam an ārya juṣṭam

original: ebhir yuddhe tartum icchasy arīṃs tu
analyzed: ebhiḥ yuddhe tartum icchasi arīn tu
akṣeṣu doṣāḥ bahavaḥ vidharmāḥ
śrutāḥ tvayā sahadevaḥ bravīt yān
tān na eṣi saṃtartum a sādhu juṣṭān
yena sma sarve nirayam prapannāḥ
sukham tvattaḥ na abhijānīma kim cit
yatas tvam akṣaiḥ devitum saṃpravṛttaḥ
svayam kṛtvā paruṣam pāṇḍava tvam
bhūyas tīkṣṇāḥ śrāvayasi adya vācaḥ
śete smābhiḥ nihatā śatru senā
chinnaiḥ gātraiḥ bhūmi tale nadantī

original: 08,049.086d*0725_07 tvayā hi tat karma kṛtaṃ nṛśaṃsaṃ
analyzed: tvayā hi tat karma kṛtam nṛśaṃsam
yasmāt doṣaḥ kauravāṇām vadhaḥ ca
hatāḥ udīcyā nihatāḥ pratīcyā
naṣṭāḥ prācyāḥ dākṣiṇātyāḥ viśastāḥ
kṛtam karma apratirūpam mahadbhiḥ
teṣām yodhaiḥ asmadīyaiḥ ca yuddhe
tvam devitā tvad kṛte rājya nāśaḥ
tvat saṃbhavam vyasanam naḥ narendra
mā asmān krūraiḥ vāc pratodaiḥ tuda tvam
bhūyas rājan kopayan alpabhāgyān
etāḥ vācaḥ paruṣāḥ savyasācī
sthira prajñam śrāvayitvā tatakṣa
babhūva asau vimanāḥ dharma bhīruḥ

original: 08,049.088b*0726_02 kṛtvā prājñaḥ pātakaṃ kiṃ cid evam
analyzed: kṛtvā prājñaḥ pātakam kim cit evam
viniśvasam jyeṣṭham aniṣṭam uktvā
tatas tu kośāt asim
samuddadhāra asim udāra karmā
nihantum ātmānam amitra sāham
tadā anutepe surarāja putraḥ
viniḥśvasan ca api asim

original: 08,049.089a tam āha kṛṣṇaḥ kim idaṃ punar bhavān;
analyzed: tam āha kṛṣṇaḥ kim idam punar bhavān
vikośam ākāśa nibham karoti asim
prabrūhi satyam punar uttaram vidheḥ
vacaḥ pravakṣyāmi aham artha siddhaye
iti eva pṛṣṭaḥ puruṣottamena
su duḥkhitaḥ keśavam āha vākyam
aham haniṣye sva śarīram eva
prasahya yena ahitam ācaram vai
niśamya tat pārtha vacaḥ bravīt idam
dhanaṃjayam dharma bhṛtām variṣṭhaḥ
rājānam enam tvam iti idam uktvā
kim kaśmalam prāviśaḥ pārtha ghoram
tvam ca ātmānam hantum icchasi ari ghna
na idam sadbhiḥ sevitam vai kirīṭin
dharma ātmānam bhrātaram jyeṣṭham adya
khaḍgena ca enam yadi hanyāḥ nṛ vīra

original: 08,049.091b*0729_07 dharmād bhītas tat kathaṃ nāma te syāt
analyzed: dharmāt bhītaḥ tat katham nāma te syāt
kim ca uttaram vā akariṣyaḥ tvam eva
sūkṣmaḥ dharmaḥ durvidaḥ ca api pārtha
viśeṣataḥ jñaiḥ procyamānam nibodha
hatvā ātmānam ātmanā prāpnuyāḥ tvam
vadhāt bhrātuḥ narakam ca ati ghoram
prabrūhi pārtha sva guṇān iha ātmanaḥ
tathā sva hārdam bhavati iha sadyas
tathā astu kṛṣṇa iti abhinandya vākyam
dhanaṃjayaḥ prāha dhanuḥ vināmya
yudhiṣṭhiram dharma bhṛtām variṣṭham
śṛṇuṣva rājan iti śakra sūnuḥ
na mādṛśaḥ nyaḥ naradeva vidyate
dhanuḥ dharaḥ devam ṛte pinākinam
aham hi tena anumataḥ mahātmanā
kṣaṇena hanyām sa carācaram jagat
mayā hi rājan sa digīśvarāḥ diśaḥ
vijitya sarvā bhavataḥ kṛtā vaśe
sa rājasūyaḥ ca samāpta dakṣiṇaḥ
sabhā ca divyā bhavataḥ mama ojasā
pāṇau pṛṣatkāḥ likhitāḥ mama ime
dhanuḥ ca saṃkhye vitatam sa bāṇam
pādau ca me sa śarau saha dhvajau
na mādṛśam yuddha gatam jayanti
hatāḥ udīcyāḥ nihatāḥ pratīcyāḥ
prācyāḥ nirastāḥ dākṣiṇātyāḥ viśastāḥ
saṃśaptakānām kim cit eva avaśiṣṭam
sarvasya sainyasya hatam mayā ardham
śete mayā nihatā bhāratī ca
camūḥ rājan deva camū prakāśā

original: 08,049.097c ye nāstrajñās tān ahaṃ hanmi śastrais;
analyzed: ye na astra jñāḥ tān aham hanmi śastraiḥ
tasmāt lokam na iha karomi bhasmasāt
jaitram ratham bhīmam āsthāya kṛṣṇa
prayāva śīghram sūtaputram nihantum
rājā bhavatu adya su nirvṛtaḥ yam
karṇam raṇe nāśayitāsmi bāṇaiḥ

original: 08,049.098a ity evam uktvā punar āha pārtho;
analyzed: iti evam uktvā punar āha pārtho
yudhiṣṭhiram dharma bhṛtām variṣṭham
vimukta śastra astra dhanuḥ visṛjya
kośe ca khaḍgam vinidhāya tūrṇam
sa vrīḍayā namra śirāḥ kirīṭī
yudhiṣṭhiram prāñjaliḥ abhyuvāca
api aputrā tena rādhā bhavitrī

original: kuntī mayā vā tad ṛtaṃ viddhi rājan
analyzed: kuntī mayā vā tat ṛtam viddhi rājan

original: 08,049.098d*0732_01 satyaṃ vadāmy adya na karṇam ājau
analyzed: satyam vadāmi adya na karṇam ājau
śaraiḥ a hatvā kavacam vimokṣye
prasīda rājan kṣama yat mayā uktam

original: kāle bhavān vetsyati tan namas te
analyzed: kāle bhavān vetsyati tat namaḥ te
prasādya rājānam amitra sāham
sthitaḥ bravīt ca enam abhiprapannaḥ
yāmi eṣa bhīmam samarāt pramoktum
sarva ātmanā sūtaputram ca hantum
tava priya artham mama jīvitam hi
bravīmi satyam tat avehi rājan
iti prāyāt upasaṃgṛhya pādau
samutthitaḥ dīpta tejāḥ kirīṭī
na idam cirāt kṣipram idam bhaviṣyati
āvartate sau abhiyāmi ca enam
etat śrutvā pāṇḍavaḥ dharmarājaḥ
bhrātuḥ vākyam paruṣam phalgunasya
utthāya tasmāt śayanāt uvāca
pārtham tatas duḥkha parīta cetāḥ

original: 08,049.102a kṛtaṃ mayā pārtha yathā na sādhu;
analyzed: kṛtam mayā pārtha yathā na sādhu
yena prāptam vyasanam vaḥ su ghoram
tasmāt śiraḥ chinddhi mama idam adya
kula antakasya adhama pūruṣasya
pāpasya pāpa vyasana anvitasya
vimūḍha buddheḥ alasasya bhīroḥ
vṛddha avamantuḥ paruṣasya ca eva

original: kiṃ te ciraṃ mām anuvṛtya rūkṣam
analyzed: kim te ciram mām anuvṛtya rūkṣam
gacchāmi aham vanam eva adya pāpaḥ
sukham bhavān vartatām mad vihīnaḥ
yogyaḥ rājā bhīmasenaḥ mahātmā
klībasya vā mama kim rājya kṛtyam
na ca asmi śaktaḥ paruṣāṇi soḍhum
punar tava imāni ruṣā anvitasya
bhīmaḥ stu rājā mama jīvitena
kim kāryam adya avamatasya vīra
iti evam uktvā sahasā utpapāta
rājā tatas tat śayanam vihāya
iyeṣa nirgantum atha u vanāya
tam vāsudevaḥ praṇataḥ bhyuvāca

original: 08,049.107a rājan viditam etat te yathā gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
analyzed: rājan viditam etat te yathā gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
pratijñā satya saṃdhasya gāṇḍīvam prati viśrutā

original: 08,049.108a brūyād ya evaṃ gāṇḍīvaṃ dehy anyasmai tvam ity uta
analyzed: brūyāt yaḥ evam gāṇḍīvam dehi anyasmai tvam iti uta

original: 08,049.108c sa vadhyo 'sya pumāṃl loke tvayā cokto 'yam īdṛśam
analyzed: sa vadhyaḥ sya pumān loke tvayā ca uktaḥ yam īdṛśam

original: 08,049.109a ataḥ satyāṃ pratijñāṃ tāṃ pārthena parirakṣatā
analyzed: atas satyām pratijñām tām pārthena parirakṣatā
mad chandāt avamānaḥ yam kṛtaḥ tava mahīpate

original: 08,049.109e gurūṇām avamāno hi vadha ity abhidhīyate
analyzed: gurūṇām avamānaḥ hi vadhaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: 08,049.110a tasmāt tvaṃ vai mahābāho mama pārthasya cobhayoḥ
analyzed: tasmāt tvam vai mahā bāho mama pārthasya ca ubhayoḥ

original: 08,049.111a śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ mahārāja prapannau sva ubhāv api
analyzed: śaraṇam tvām mahā rāja prapannau svaḥ ubhau api
kṣantum arhasi me rājan praṇatasya abhiyācataḥ

original: 08,049.112c satyaṃ te pratijānāmi hataṃ viddhy adya sūtajam
analyzed: satyam te pratijānāmi hatam viddhi adya sūtajam

original: 08,049.112e yasyecchasi vadhaṃ tasya gatam evādya jīvitam
analyzed: yasya icchasi vadham tasya gatam evā adya jīvitam
iti kṛṣṇa vacaḥ śrutvā dharmarājaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
sa saṃbhramam hṛṣīkeśam utthāpya praṇatam tadā
kṛtāñjalim idam vākyam uvāca anantaram vacaḥ

original: 08,049.114a evam etad yathāttha tvam asty eṣo 'tikramo mama
analyzed: evam etat yathā āttha tvam asti mama
anunītaḥ smi govinda tāritaḥ ca adya mādhava

original: 08,049.114e mokṣitā vyasanād ghorād vayam adya tvayācyuta
analyzed: mokṣitāḥ vyasanāt ghorāt vayam adya tvayā acyuta
bhavantam nātham āsādya āvām vyasana sāgarāt
ghorāt adya samuttīrṇau ubhau ajñāna mohitau
tvad buddhi plavam āsādya duḥkha śoka arṇavāt vayam
samuttīrṇāḥ saha amātyāḥ sa nāthāḥ sma tvayā acyuta

original: 08,050.001*0733_01 dharmarājasya tac chrutvā prītiyuktaṃ vacas tataḥ
analyzed: dharmarājasya tat śrutvā prīti yuktam vacaḥ tatas
pārtham provāca dharma ātmā govindaḥ yadu nandanaḥ
iti sma kṛṣṇa vacanāt pratyuccārya yudhiṣṭhiram

original: 08,050.001c babhūva vimanāḥ pārthaḥ kiṃ cit kṛtveva pātakam
analyzed: babhūva vimanāḥ pārthaḥ kim cit kṛtvā iva pātakam

original: 08,050.002c kathaṃ nāma bhaved etad yadi tvaṃ pārtha dharmajam

karāḥ nikṛttāḥ prapatanti amī kṣuraiḥ
kirīṭinā tena punar sa sādinaḥ
śaraiḥ nikṛttāḥ kuliśaiḥ iva adrayaḥ
tathā eva kṛṣṇasya ca pāñcajanyam
mahārham etat dvija rāja varṇam
kaunteya paśya urasi kaustubham ca
jājvalyamānam vijayām srajam ca
dhruvam ratha agryaḥ samupaiti pārtho
vidrāvayan sainyam idam pareṣām
sita abhra varṇaiḥ asita prayuktaiḥ
hayaiḥ mahārhaiḥ rathinām variṣṭhaḥ
rathān hayān patti gaṇān ca sāyakaiḥ
vidāritān paśya patanti amī yathā
tava anujena amararāja tejasā
mahā vanāni iva suparṇa vāyunā
catuḥśatān paśya rathān imān hatān
sa vāji sūtān samare kirīṭinā
mahā iṣubhiḥ sapta śatāni dantinām
padāti sādīn ca rathān anekaśas
ayam samabhyeti tava antikam balī
nighnan kurūn citraḥ iva grahaḥ rjunaḥ
samṛddha kāmaḥ si hatāḥ tava ahitā
balam tava āyuḥ ca cirāya vardhatām
bhīmaḥ uvāca
dadāmi te grāma varān caturdaśa
priya ākhyāne sārathe su prasannaḥ
ca api rathān ca viṃśatim
yat arjunam vedayase viśoka
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 08,055.001a śrutvā ca rathanirghoṣaṃ siṃhanādaṃ ca saṃyuge
analyzed: śrutvā ca ratha nirghoṣam siṃhanādam ca saṃyuge

original: 08,055.001c arjunaḥ prāha govindaṃ śīghraṃ codaya vājinaḥ
analyzed: arjunaḥ prāha govindam śīghram codaya vājinaḥ
jayatu bhuvana bhartā dharma vid dharma rājaḥ
diśatu śivam idānīm keśavaḥ pāṇḍavebhyaḥ
vipula vijaya vājī jṛmbhatām vai kirīṭī
ripu kula vana dāhau mā adri putrau bhavetām

original: 08,055.002c eṣa gacchāmi sukṣipraṃ yatra bhīmo vyavasthitaḥ
analyzed: eṣa gacchāmi su kṣipram yatra bhīmaḥ vyavasthitaḥ
āyāntam aśvaiḥ hima śaṅkha varṇaiḥ
suvarṇa muktā maṇi jāla naddhaiḥ
jambham jighāṃsum pragṛhīta vajram
jayāya deva indram iva ugra manyum
ratha aśva mātaṅga padāti saṃghā
bāṇa svanaiḥ nemi khura svanaiḥ ca
saṃnādayantaḥ vasudhām diśaḥ ca
kruddhāḥ nṛ siṃhāḥ jayam abhyudīyuḥ
teṣām ca pārthasya mahat tadā āsīt
deha asu pāpma kṣapaṇam su yuddham
trailokya hetoḥ asuraiḥ yathā āsīt
devasya viṣṇoḥ jayatām varasya
trailoka nāthasya ca cakrapāṇeḥ
taiḥ astam uccāvacam āyudha ogham
ekaḥ praciccheda kirīṭamālī
kṣura ardhacandraiḥ niśitaiḥ ca bāṇaiḥ
śirāṃsi teṣām bahudhā ca bāhūn
chatrāṇi vāla vyajanāni ketūn
aśvān rathān patti gaṇān dvipān ca
te petuḥ urvyām bahudhā virūpā
vāta prabhagnāni yathā vanāni
suvarṇa jāla avatatāḥ mahā gajāḥ
sa vaijayantī dhvaja yodha kalpitāḥ
suvarṇa puṅkhaiḥ iṣubhiḥ samācitāḥ
cakāśire prajvalitāḥ yathā acalāḥ
vidīryamāṇāḥ valinā atra nāgāḥ
dava agni dagdhaiḥ iva vaṃśa dagdhaiḥ

original: 08,055.009a vidārya nāgāṃś ca rathāṃś ca vājinaḥ;
analyzed: vidārya nāgān ca rathān ca vājinaḥ
śara uttamaiḥ vāsava vajra saṃnibhaiḥ
drutam yayau karṇa jighāṃsayā tathā
yathā marutvān bala bhedane purā
tatas sa puruṣa vyāghraḥ sūta sainyam ariṃdama
praviveśa mahā bāhuḥ makaraḥ sāgaram yathā

gaja aśva sādi bahulāḥ pāṇḍavam samupādravan

original: 08,055.013a te tu taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vyāghrā iva mahārathāḥ
analyzed: te tu tam puruṣa vyāghram vyāghrāḥ iva mahā rathāḥ

analyzed: arjunaḥ vyadhamat sainyam mahā vātaḥ ghanān iva

nara mīnām aśva nakrām keśa śaivala śādvalām
saṃchinna bhuja nāga indrām bahu ratna apahāriṇīm
ūru grāhām majja paṅkām śīrṣa upala samākulām
dhanuṣka āśām śarāvāpām gadā parigha ketanām

hāra padma ākarām ca eva bhūmi reṇu ūrmi mālinīm
ārya vṛttavatīm saṃkhye sutarām bhīru dustarām

tathā dustaraṇīm ghorām bhīrūṇām bhaya vardhanīm
tathā prāvartayat bhīmaḥ vīra yodha apahāriṇīm

vadhe dhṛtaḥ karṇa sutasya saṃkhye
uvāca karṇam bhṛśam utsmayan tadā
duryodhanam drauṇi mukhān ca sarvān
aham raṇe vṛṣasenam tam ugram
saṃpaśyataḥ karṇa tava adya saṃkhye
nayāmi lokam niśitaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
yamasya yāvat hi janāḥ vadanti
bhavadbhiḥ sarvaiḥ mama sūnuḥ hataḥ sau
ekaḥ rathaḥ mad vihīnaḥ tarasvī
aham haniṣye bhavatām samakṣam
saṃrakṣyatām ratha saṃsthāḥ sutaḥ yam
aham haniṣye vṛṣasenam enam
paścāt vadhiṣye tvām api saṃpramūḍham
aham haniṣye rjune āji madhye
tam adya mūlam kalahasya saṃkhye
duryodhana apāśraya jāta darpam
tvām adya hantāsmi raṇe prasahya
asya eva hantā yudhi bhīmasenaḥ
duryodhanasya adhama pūruṣasya
yasya ānayāt eṣa mahān kṣayaḥ bhavat
saḥ evam uktvā vinimṛjya cāpam
lakṣyam hi kṛtvā vṛṣasenam ājau
mumoca bāṇān viśikhān mahātmā
vadhāya rājan sūtaputrasya saṃkhye
vivyādha ca enam daśabhiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
marmasu asaktam prasabham kirīṭī
ciccheda ca asya iṣvasanam bhujau ca
kṣuraiḥ caturbhiḥ śiraḥ eva ca ugraiḥ
sa pārtha bāṇa abhihataḥ papāta
rathāt vibāhuḥ viśirāḥ dharāyām
su puṣpitaḥ parṇa dharaḥ tikāyaḥ
vāta īritaḥ śālaḥ iva adri śṛṅgāt
tam prekṣya bāṇa abhihatam patantam
rathāt sutam sūta jaḥ kṣiprakārī
ratham rathena āśu jagāma vegāt
kirīṭinaḥ putra vadha abhitaptaḥ
saṃjayaḥ
tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya velā udvṛttam iva arṇavam
garjantam su mahā kāyam durnivāram suraiḥ api
arjunam prāha dāśārhaḥ prahasya puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 08,062.062d@036_0004 ayaṃ sa ratha āyāti śvetāśvaḥ śalyasārathiḥ
analyzed: ayam sa rathaḥ āyāti śveta aśvaḥ śalya sārathiḥ

original: 08,062.062d@036_0005 yena te saha yoddhavyaṃ sthiro bhava dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: yena te saha yoddhavyam sthiraḥ bhava dhanaṃjaya

original: 08,062.062d@036_0006 paśya cainaṃ samāyuktaṃ rathaṃ karṇasya pāṇḍava
analyzed: paśya ca enam samāyuktam ratham karṇasya pāṇḍava
śveta vāji samāyuktam yuktam rādhāsutena ca
nānā patākā kalilam kiṅkiṇī jāla mālinam
uhyamānam iva ākāśe vimānam pāṇḍuraiḥ hayaiḥ

original: 08,062.062d@036_0010 dhvajaṃ ca paśya karṇasya nāgakakṣaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: dhvajam ca paśya karṇasya nāga kakṣam mahātmanaḥ
ākhaṇḍaladhanuḥ prakhyam ullikhantam iva ambaram
paśya karṇam samāyāntam dhārtarāṣṭra priya eṣiṇam
śara dhārāḥ vimuñcantam dhārā sāram iva ambudam
eṣa madra īśvaraḥ rājā ratha agre paryavasthitaḥ
niyacchati hayān asya rādheyasya amita ojasaḥ
śṛṇu dundubhi nirghoṣam śaṅkha śabdam ca dāruṇam

original: 08,062.062d@036_0017 siṃhanādāṃś ca vividhāñ śṛṇu pāṇḍava sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: siṃhanādān ca vividhām śṛṇu pāṇḍava sarvaśas
antardhāya mahā śabdān karṇena amita tejasā
dodhūyamānasya bhṛśam dhanuṣaḥ śṛṇu nisvanam
ete dīryanti sa gaṇāḥ pāñcālānām mahā rathāḥ

original: 08,062.062d@036_0021 dṛṣṭvā kesariṇaṃ kruddhaṃ mṛgā iva mahāvane
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā kesariṇam kruddham mṛgāḥ iva mahā vane
sarva yatnena kaunteya hantum arhasi sūtajam

original: 08,062.062d@036_0023 na hi karṇaśarān anyaḥ soḍhum utsahate 'nagha
analyzed: na hi karṇa śarān anyaḥ soḍhum utsahate nagha
sa deva asura gandharvān trīn lokān sa carācarān

original: 08,062.062d@036_0025 tvaṃ hi jetuṃ raṇe śaktas tathaiva viditaṃ mama
analyzed: tvam hi jetum raṇe śaktaḥ tathā eva viditam mama

original: 08,062.062d@036_0026 bhīmam ugraṃ mahādevaṃ tryakṣaṃ śarvaṃ kapardinam
analyzed: bhīmam ugram mahādevam tryakṣam śarvam kapardinam

original: 08,062.062d@036_0027 na śaktā draṣṭum īśānaṃ kiṃ punar yodhituṃ prabhum
analyzed: na śaktāḥ draṣṭum īśānam kim punar yodhitum prabhum
tvayā sākṣāt mahādevaḥ sarva bhūta śivaḥ śivaḥ

original: 08,062.062d@036_0029 yuddhenārādhitaḥ sthāṇur devāś ca varadās tava
analyzed: yuddhena ārādhitaḥ sthāṇuḥ devāḥ ca vara dāḥ tava
tasya pārtha prasādena devadevasya śūlinaḥ

original: 08,062.062d@036_0031 jahi karṇaṃ mahābāho namuciṃ vṛtrahā yathā
analyzed: jahi karṇam mahā bāho namucim vṛtrahā yathā
arjunaḥ uvāca

original: 08,062.062d@036_0032 śreyas te 'stu sadā pārtha yuddhe jayam avāpnuhi
analyzed: śreyaḥ te stu sadā pārtha yuddhe jayam avāpnuhi

original: 08,062.062d@036_0033 dhruva eva jayaḥ kṛṣṇa mama nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: dhruvaḥ eva jayaḥ kṛṣṇa mama na asti atra saṃśayaḥ
sarva loka guruḥ yaḥ tvam tuṣṭaḥ si madhusūdana
codaya aśvān hṛṣīkeśa ratham mama mahā ratha
na a hatvā samare śatrum nivartiṣyati phalgunaḥ

original: 08,062.062d@036_0037 adya karṇaṃ hataṃ paśya maccharaiḥ śakalīkṛtam
analyzed: adya karṇam hatam paśya mad śaraiḥ śakalīkṛtam

original: 08,062.062d@036_0038 māṃ vā drakṣyasi govinda karṇena nihataṃ śaraiḥ
analyzed: mām vā drakṣyasi govinda karṇena nihatam śaraiḥ
upasthitam idam ghoram yuddham trailokya mohanam

original: 08,062.062d@036_0040 yaj janāḥ kathayiṣyanti yāvad bhūmir dhariṣyati
analyzed: yat janāḥ kathayiṣyanti yāvat bhūmiḥ dhariṣyati

original: 08,062.062d@036_0041 evaṃ bruvaṃs tadā pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam akliṣṭakāriṇam
analyzed: evam bruvan tadā pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam akliṣṭa kāriṇam
pratyudyayau rathena āśu gajam pratigajaḥ yathā

original: 08,062.062d@036_0043 punaś cāha mahātejāḥ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam ariṃdamam
analyzed: punar ca āha mahā tejāḥ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam ariṃdamam
codaya aśvān hṛṣīkeśa kālaḥ yam ativartate

original: 08,062.062d@036_0045 evam uktas tadā tena pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tadā tena pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
jayena saṃpūjya sa pāṇḍavam tadā
pracodayām āsa hayān manaḥ javān
sa pāṇḍu putrasya rathaḥ manaḥ javaḥ
kṣaṇena karṇasya ratha agratas bhavat
tatas samakṣam sva sutam vilokya
karṇaḥ hatam śveta hayena saṃkhye
saṃrambham āgamya param mahātmā
kṛṣṇa arjunau sahasā eva abhyadhāvat

original: 08,062.062d*0975_01 śiraḥ karau caiva dhanuś ca pārtha
analyzed: śiraḥ karau ca eva dhanuḥ ca pārtha
eka iṣuṇā vṛṣasenasya saṃkhye
ciccheda pārthaḥ hi aṅga rājasya sainyam
kopa agninā caturaṅgam dadāha
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
vṛṣasenam hatam dṛṣṭvā śoka amarṣa samanvitaḥ

original: 08,063.001c muktvā śokodbhavaṃ vāri netrābhyāṃ sahasā vṛṣaḥ
analyzed: muktvā śoka udbhavam vāri netrābhyām sahasā vṛṣaḥ
rathena karṇaḥ tejasvī jagāma abhimukhaḥ ripūn
yuddhāya āmarṣa tāmra akṣaḥ samāhūya dhanaṃjayam
tau rathau sūrya saṃkāśau vaiyāghra parivāraṇau

original: 08,063.003c sametau dadṛśus tatra dvāv ivārkau samāgatau
analyzed: sametau dadṛśuḥ tatra dvau iva arkau samāgatau
śveta aśvau puruṣa ādityau āsthitau ari mardanau
rathau caturbhiḥ jaladaiḥ bhaga mitrau iva ambare
śuśubhāte mahātmānau candra ādityau yathā divi

original: 08,063.005a tau dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ jagmuḥ sarvabhūtāni māriṣa
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā vismayam jagmuḥ sarva bhūtāni māriṣa
trailokya vijaye yattau indra vairocanau iva
ratha jyā tala nirhrādaiḥ bāṇa śaṅkha ravaiḥ api
tau rathau abhidhāvantau samālokya mahīkṣitām

original: 08,063.007a dhvajau ca dṛṣṭvā saṃsaktau vismayaḥ samapadyata
analyzed: dhvajau ca dṛṣṭvā saṃsaktau vismayaḥ samapadyata

original: 08,063.007c hastikakṣyāṃ ca karṇasya vānaraṃ ca kirīṭinaḥ
analyzed: hasti kakṣyām ca karṇasya vānaram ca kirīṭinaḥ

original: 08,063.008a tau rathau saṃprasaktau ca dṛṣṭvā bhārata pārthivāḥ
analyzed: tau rathau saṃprasaktau ca dṛṣṭvā bhārata pārthivāḥ
siṃhanāda ravān cakruḥ sādhuvādān ca puṣkalān

original: 08,063.009a śrutvā tu dvairathaṃ tābhyāṃ tatra yodhāḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu dvairatham tābhyām tatra yodhāḥ samantataḥ

original: 08,063.009c cakrur bāhuvalaṃ caiva tathā celavalaṃ mahat
analyzed: cakruḥ bāhu valam ca eva tathā cela valam mahat
ājagmuḥ kuravaḥ tatra vāditra anugatāḥ tadā

original: 08,063.010c karṇaṃ praharṣayantaś ca śaṅkhān dadhmuś ca puṣkalān
analyzed: karṇam praharṣayantaḥ ca śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ ca puṣkalān
rādheyam abhitas dadhmuḥ śaṅkhām śata sahasraśas
tathā eva pāṇḍavāḥ sarve harṣayantaḥ dhanaṃjayam
tūrya śaṅkha ninādena diśaḥ sarvāḥ vyanādayan
kṣveḍita āsphoṭita utkruṣṭaiḥ tumulam sarvatas bhavat
bāhu ghoṣāḥ ca vīrāṇām karṇa arjuna samāgame

original: 08,063.013a tau dṛṣṭvā puruṣavyāghrau rathasthau rathināṃ varau
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā puruṣa vyāghrau ratha sthau rathinām varau
pragṛhīta mahā cāpau śara śakti gadā āyudhau
varmiṇau baddha nistriṃśau śveta aśvau śaṅkha śobhinau
kṛṣṇa śalya ratha upetau tulya rūpau mahā rathau
siṃha skandhau siṃha bhujau rakta akṣau hema mālinau
cāpa vidyut dhvaja upetau śastra saṃpatti śobhinau
camara vyajana upetau śveta chattra abhiśobhinau
tūṇīra vara saṃpannau dvau api sma su darśanau
raktacandana digdha aṅgau sa madau vṛṣabhau iva
siṃha skandha pratīkāśau vyūḍha uraskau mahā balau
anyonya spardhinau rājan anyonyasya vadha eṣiṇau
anyonyam abhidhāvantau goṣṭheṣu iva mahā ṛṣabhau

original: 08,063.015b*0979_04 prabhinnāv iva mātaṅgau saṃrabdhāv iva cācalau
analyzed: prabhinnau iva mātaṅgau saṃrabdhau iva ca acalau
āśīviṣa sama prakhyau yama kāla antaka upamau
indra vṛtrau iva kruddhau sūryācandrama saprabhau
mahā grahau iva krūrau yuga ante samupasthitau
deva garbhau deva samau deva tulyau ca rūpataḥ
yadṛcchayā sameyātām sūryācandramasau iva
balinau samare dṛptau nānā śastra dharau yudhi

original: 08,063.017b*0981_01 tau dṛṣṭvā puruṣavyāghrau śārdūlāv iva vegitau
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā puruṣa vyāghrau śārdūlau iva vegitau

original: 08,063.017b*0981_02 babhūva paramo harṣas tāvakānāṃ viśāṃ pate
analyzed: babhūva paramaḥ harṣaḥ tāvakānām viśām pate
saṃśayaḥ sarva bhūtānām vijaye samapadyata
sametau puruṣa vyāghrau prekṣya karṇa dhanaṃjayau
ubhau vara āyudha dharau ubhau raṇa kṛta śramau
ubhau astra bhṛtām śreṣṭhau ubhau siṃha parākramau
ubhau ca bāhu śabdena nādayantau nabhastalam
ubhau viśruta karmāṇau pauruṣeṇa balena ca
ubhau ca sadṛśau yuddhe śambara amararājayoḥ
kārtavīrya samau yuddhe tathā dāśaratheḥ samau
viṣṇu vīrya samau vīrye tathā bhava samau yudhi
ubhau śveta hayau rājan ratha pravara vāhinau

original: 08,063.021c sārathī pravarau caiva tayor āstāṃ mahābalau
analyzed: sārathī pravarau ca eva tayoḥ āstām mahā balau

original: 08,063.022a tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahārāja rājamānau mahārathau
analyzed: tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahā rāja rājamānau mahā rathau
siddha cāraṇa saṃghānām vismayaḥ samapadyata
dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ tatas karṇam sa balāḥ bharata ṛṣabha
parivavruḥ mahātmānam kṣipram āhava śobhinam
tathā eva pāṇḍavāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ dhṛṣṭadyumna purogamāḥ

original: 08,063.024b*0983_01 yamau ca cekitānaś ca prahṛṣṭāś ca prabhadrakāḥ
analyzed: yamau ca cekitānaḥ ca prahṛṣṭāḥ ca prabhadrakāḥ

original: 08,063.024b*0983_02 nānādeśyāś ca ye śūrāḥ śiṣṭā yuddhābhinandinaḥ
analyzed: nānādeśyāḥ ca ye śūrāḥ śiṣṭāḥ yuddha abhinandinaḥ

original: 08,063.024b*0983_03 te sarve sahitā hṛṣṭāḥ parivavrur dhanaṃjayam
analyzed: te sarve sahitāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ parivavruḥ dhanaṃjayam
rirakṣiṣantaḥ śatru ghnāḥ pati aśva ratha kuñjaraiḥ
dhanaṃjayasya vijaye dhṛtāḥ karṇa vadhe ca
tathā eva tāvakāḥ sarve yattāḥ senā prahāriṇaḥ
duryodhana mukhāḥ rājan karṇam jugupuḥ āhave
parivavruḥ mahātmānam pārtham apratimam yudhi

original: 08,063.025a tāvakānāṃ raṇe karṇo glaha āsīd viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tāvakānām raṇe karṇaḥ glahe āsīt viśām pate
tathā eva pāṇḍaveyānām glahaḥ pārthaḥ bhavat yudhi

original: 08,063.026a ta eva sabhyās tatrāsan prekṣakāś cābhavan sma te
analyzed: te eva sabhyāḥ tatra āsan prekṣakāḥ ca abhavan sma te
tatra eṣām glahamānānām dhruvau jaya parājayau
tābhyām dyūtam samāyattam vijayāya itarasmai vā
asmākam paṇḍavānām ca sthitānām raṇa mūrdhani

original: 08,063.028a tau tu sthitau mahārāja samare yuddhaśālinau
analyzed: tau tu sthitau mahā rāja samare yuddha śālinau
anyonyam pratisaṃrabdhau anyonyasya jaya eṣiṇau
tau ubhau prajihīrṣetām indra vṛtrau iva abhitas
bhīma rūpa dharau āstām mahā dhūmau iva grahau
tatas ntarikṣe sa ākṣepāḥ vivādāḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: 08,063.030c mitho bhedāś ca bhūtānām āsan karṇārjunāntare
analyzed: mithas bhedāḥ ca bhūtānām āsan karṇa arjuna antare

original: 08,063.030e vyāśrayanta diśo bhinnāḥ sarvalokāś ca māriṣa
analyzed: vyāśrayanta diśaḥ bhinnāḥ sarva lokāḥ ca māriṣa
deva dānava gandharvāḥ piśāca uraga rākṣasāḥ
pratipakṣa graham cakruḥ karṇa arjuna samāgame

original: 08,063.032a dyaur āsīt karṇato vyagrā sanakṣatrā viśāṃ pate
analyzed: dyauḥ āsīt karṇataḥ vyagrā sa nakṣatrā viśām pate

original: 08,063.032c bhūmir viśālā pārthasya mātā putrasya bhārata
analyzed: bhūmiḥ viśālā pārthasya mātā putrasya bhārata

original: 08,063.033a saritaḥ sāgarāś caiva girayaś ca narottama
analyzed: saritaḥ sāgarāḥ ca eva girayaḥ ca narottama
vṛkṣāḥ ca oṣadhayaḥ tatra vyāśrayanta kirīṭinam

original: 08,063.034a asurā yātudhānāś ca guhyakāś ca paraṃtapa
analyzed: asurāḥ yātudhānāḥ ca guhyakāḥ ca paraṃtapa
karṇataḥ samapadyanta khecarāṇi vayāṃsi ca
munayaḥ cāraṇāḥ siddhāḥ
ratnāni nidhayaḥ sarve vedāḥ ca ākhyāna pañcamāḥ
sa upaveda upaniṣadaḥ sa rahasyāḥ sa saṃgrahāḥ
vāsukiḥ citrasenaḥ ca takṣakaḥ ca upatakṣakaḥ

original: 08,063.036c parvatāś ca tathā sarve kādraveyāś ca sānvayāḥ
analyzed: parvatāḥ ca tathā sarve kādraveyāḥ ca sa anvayāḥ
viṣavantaḥ mahā roṣāḥ nāgāḥ ca arjunataḥ bhavan
airāvatāḥ saurabheyāḥ vaiśāleyāḥ ca bhoginaḥ
ete bhavan arjunataḥ kṣudra sarpāḥ tu karṇataḥ
īhāmṛgāḥ vyāḍa mṛgāḥ maṅgalyāḥ ca mṛga dvijāḥ

original: 08,063.038b*0985_01 maṅgaḷyāḥ paśavaś caiva siṃhavyāghrās tathaiva ca
analyzed: maṅgaḷyāḥ paśavaḥ ca eva siṃha vyāghrāḥ tathā eva ca
pārthasya vijayam rājan sarve eva abhisaṃśritāḥ

original: 08,063.039a vasavo marutaḥ sādhyā rudrā viśve 'śvinau tathā
analyzed: vasavaḥ marutaḥ sādhyāḥ rudrāḥ viśve śvinau tathā

original: 08,063.039b*0986_01 arjunasya jaye cāstām aśvināv api sapriyau
analyzed: arjunasya jaye ca āstām aśvinau api sa priyau

original: 08,063.039c agnir indraś ca somaś ca pavanaś ca diśo daśa
analyzed: agniḥ indraḥ ca somaḥ ca pavanaḥ ca diśaḥ daśa
karṇataḥ samapadyanta śva sṛgāla vayāṃsi ca

original: 08,063.039d*0987_02 mṛgāś ca paśavaś caiva siṃhavyāghrās tathaiva ca
analyzed: mṛgāḥ ca paśavaḥ ca eva siṃha vyāghrāḥ tathā eva ca

original: 08,063.039d*0987_03 vasavaś ca mahendreṇa marutaś ca sahāgninā
analyzed: vasavaḥ ca mahā indreṇa marutaḥ ca saha agninā

original: 08,063.039d*0988_01 agni(gnī ?) rudraś ca somaś ca yamo vaiśravaṇas tadā
analyzed: rudraḥ ca somaḥ ca yamaḥ vaiśravaṇaḥ tadā
dhanaṃjayam upājagmuḥ ādityāḥ karṇataḥ bhavan

original: 08,063.039f*0989_01 viśaḥ śūdrāś ca sūtāś ca varṇasaṃkarajāś ca ye
analyzed: viśaḥ śūdrāḥ ca sūtāḥ ca varṇa saṃkara jāḥ ca ye

original: 08,063.039f*0989_02 sarvasattveṣu te rājan rādheyam abhajaṃs tadā
analyzed: sarva sattveṣu te rājan rādheyam abhajan tadā
devāḥ tu pitṛbhiḥ sārdham sa gaṇa arjunataḥ bhavan

viyat gatāḥ ca arjuna karṇa saṃyuge
bhujāḥ sa vajra aṅgulayaḥ samucchritāḥ
sa siṃhanādā hṛṣitaiḥ didṛkṣubhiḥ
yadā arjunam mattam iva dvipaḥ dvipam
samabhyayāt ādhirathiḥ jighāṃsayā
tatas kurūṇām atha somakānām
śabdaḥ mahān prādurabhūt samantāt
yadā arjunam sūtaputro parāhṇe
mahā āhave śailam iva ambudaḥ rchat
tathā eva ca āsīt rathayoḥ samāgamaḥ
mahā raṇe śoṇita māṃsa kardame
abhyakrośan somakāḥ tatra pārtham
tvarasva yāhi arjuna vidhya karṇam
chinddhi asya mūrdhānam alam cireṇa
śraddhām ca rājyāt dhṛtarāṣṭra sūnoḥ
tathā asmākam bahavaḥ tatra yodhāḥ
karṇam tadā yāhi yāhi iti avocan
jahi arjunam karṇa tatas sa cīrāḥ
punar vanam yāntu cirāya pārthāḥ
tatas karṇaḥ prathamam tatra pārtham
mahā iṣubhiḥ daśabhiḥ paryavidhyat
tam arjunaḥ pratyavidhyat śita agraiḥ
kakṣāntare daśabhiḥ atīva kruddhaḥ
karṇaḥ tha pūrvam daśabhiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
gāṇḍīvadhanvānam avidhyat āśu
jaghāna tam ca api tatas kirīṭī
śaraiḥ tathā aṣṭādaśabhiḥ su muktaiḥ
punar ca karṇaḥ pārtham
ratheṣubhiḥ tam daśabhiḥ jaghāna
tam ca api pārthaḥ daśabhiḥ śita agraiḥ
kakṣyā antare tīkṣṇa mukhaiḥ avidhyat
karṇaḥ tatas bhārata sāṃparāye
ghore tivelam raṇa saṃvimardī
jaghāna pārtham navabhiḥ śita agraiḥ
kakṣyā antare nāgam iva prabhinnam
tatas parābhyām yudhi sūtaputraḥ
dvābhyām kṣurābhyām harim āśukārī
samājaghāna tvarayā mahātmā
yathā sura indram namuciḥ prasahya
tam pāṇḍavaḥ pañcabhiḥ āyasa agraiḥ
ākarṇapūrṇaiḥ nijaghāna karṇam
te śoṇitam tasya papuḥ tadānīm
kālasya dūtāḥ iva pārtha bāṇāḥ
karṇaḥ pi pārtham saha vāsudevam
samācinot bhārata vatsadantaiḥ
parasparam tau viśikhaiḥ su tīkṣṇaiḥ
tatakṣatuḥ sūtaputraḥ rjunaḥ ca
parasparasya antara īpsū vimarde
su bhīmam abhyāyayatuḥ prahṛṣṭau
tatas rjunaḥ prāsṛjat ugra dhanvā
bhujau ubhau gāṇḍivam ca anumṛjya
nārāca nālīka varāhakarṇān
kṣurān tathā sa añjalika ardhacandrān
te sarvatas samakīryanta rājan
pārtha iṣavaḥ karṇa ratham viśantaḥ
avāk mukhāḥ pakṣi gaṇāḥ dina ante
viśanti keta artham iva āśu vṛkṣam
yān arjunaḥ sa bhrukuṭī kaṭākṣaḥ
karṇāya rājan asṛjat jita ariḥ
tān sāyakaiḥ grasate sūtaputraḥ
kṣiptān kṣiptān pāṇḍavasya iṣu saṃghān
tatas karṇaḥ bhārgaveṇa abhisṛṣṭam
prāduścakre brāhmam astram mahātmā
tatas prajajvāla tat astram ugram
yugānta sūrya jvalana prakāśam
pātālam astreṇa nihatya tena
jaghāna karṇaḥ nara nāga saṃghān
tatas stram āgneyam amitra tāpanam
mumoca karṇāya sureśvara ātmajaḥ
dhanaṃjayaḥ saṃyuga mūrdhani jvalan
atha prajajvāla tat astram uttamam
jvālābhiḥ atyartha viniḥsṛtābhiḥ
astrasya sūrasya mahā indra sūnoḥ
bhūmi antarikṣe ca diśaḥ rka mārgam
prāvṛtya dehaḥ sya babhūva dīptaḥ
yodhāḥ ca sarve jvalita antara ārtāḥ
pradudruvuḥ tatra vidagdha vastrāḥ
śabdaḥ ca babhūva tatra
yathā vane veṇu vanasya dahyataḥ
samīkṣya karṇaḥ jvalana astram udyatam
sa vāruṇam tat praśama artham āhave
samutsṛjan sūta sutaḥ pratāpavān
sa tena vahnim śamayām babhūva
balāhaka astreṇa diśaḥ tarasvī
cakāra sarvān timireṇa saṃvṛtāḥ
tatas dharitrīdhara tulya rodhasaḥ
samantataḥ vai parivārya vāriṇā
taiḥ ca ativegāt sa tathāvidhaḥ pi
nītaḥ śamam vahniḥ ati pracaṇḍaḥ
balāhakaiḥ ca eva digantarāṇi
vyāptāni sarvāṇi yathā nabhaḥ ca

original: 08,065.013d*1041_01 tathā ca sarvās timireṇa vai diśo
analyzed: tathā ca sarvāḥ timireṇa vai diśaḥ

original: 08,065.013d*1041_02 meghair vṛtā na pradṛśyeta kiṃ cit
analyzed: meghaiḥ vṛtā na pradṛśyeta kim cit
apāvahat megha gaṇān tatas tān
samīraṇa astreṇa samīritena saḥ
tatas saḥ stram dayitam devarājñaḥ
prāduścakre vajram amitra tāpanaḥ
gāṇḍīva jyām vimṛśan ca ati manyuḥ
dhanaṃjayaḥ śatru saṃgha pramāthī
tatas kṣura pra añjalikā ardhacandrā
nārāca nāḷīka varāhakarṇāḥ
gāṇḍīvataḥ prādurāsan su tīkṣṇāḥ
sahasraśas vajra samāna vegāḥ
te sarvatas paryadhāvanta ghorāḥ
pārtha iṣavaḥ karṇa ratham vihaṃgāḥ
adhomukhāḥ pakṣi gaṇāḥ dina ante
niśāniketa artham iva āśu vṛkṣam
jagrāha tān sūtaputraḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
kṣiptān tathā pāṇḍava bāṇa saṃghān
a mṛṣyamāṇasya dhanaṃjayasya
raṇa ajire tu antaka tulya karmā
vaikartanaḥ roṣa parīta cetāḥ
jyotiṣprabhām yadvat udāgataḥ san
divākaraḥ nāśayate kṣaṇena
pārthasya tān bāṇa gaṇān samagrān
vyanāśayat yudhyataḥ eva karṇaḥ
te karṇam āsādya mahā prabhāvāḥ
su tejanāḥ gārdhra patrāḥ su vegāḥ
gātreṣu sarveṣu hayeṣu ca api
śarāsane yuga cakre dhvaje ca
nirbhidya tūrṇam viviśuḥ su tīkṣṇāḥ
tārkṣya trastāḥ bhūmim iva uragāḥ te
śara ācita aṅgaḥ rudhira ārdra gātraḥ
karṇaḥ tadā roṣa vivṛtta netraḥ
samudra ghoṣam
prāduścakre bhārgava astram mahātmā
mahā indra śastra abhimukhān vimuktān
chittvā karṇaḥ pāṇḍavasya iṣu saṃghān
pārtha astram astreṇa nihatya tena
jaghāna karṇaḥ nṛ gaja aśva saṃghān
a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ tu mahā vimarde
mahā rathaḥ bhārgava astra prabhāvāt
pāñcālānām pravarān ca api yodhān
krodha āviṣṭaḥ sūtaputraḥ tarasvī
bāṇaiḥ vivyādha āhave su pramuktaiḥ
prahasya kṛṣṇau tu nara pravīraḥ
tatas pāñcālāḥ somakāḥ ca api rājan
karṇena ājau pīḍyamānāḥ śara oghaiḥ
krodha āviṣṭāḥ vivyadhuḥ tam samantāt
tīkṣṇaiḥ bāṇaiḥ sūtaputram sametāḥ

original: 08,065.013d*1046_13 tān astāṃs taiḥ sa nikṛtyāśu bāṇān
analyzed: tān astān taiḥ sa nikṛtya āśu bāṇān
pāñcālānām ratha nāga aśva saṃghān
abhyardayat bāṇa gaṇaiḥ prasahya
vikṣobhayan samare sūtaputraḥ
te bhinna dehāḥ vyasavaḥ nipetuḥ
karṇa iṣubhiḥ bhūmi tale svanantaḥ
kruddhena siṃhena yathā eva nāgā
mahā balā bhīma balena tadvat
pāñcālānām pravarān saṃnihatya
praspardhamānān balinaḥ yodha mukhyān
tatas sa rājan virarāja karṇaḥ
śarān vaman meghaḥ iva ambu dhārāḥ
karṇasya matvā tu jayam tvadīyāḥ
parām mudam siṃhanādān ca cakruḥ

original: 08,065.013d*1046_27 sarve hy amanyanta vaśe kṛtau tau
analyzed: sarve hi amanyanta vaśe kṛtau tau
karṇena kṛṣṇau iti kaurava indra
tat tādṛśam prekṣya mahā rathasya
karṇasya vīryam ca paraiḥ asahyam
dṛṣṭvā tu karṇena dhanaṃjayasya
saṃgrāma madhye nihatam tat astram
a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ ca mahā vimarde
tatra akrudhyat bhīmasenaḥ mahātmā
atha abravīt pāṇinā pāṇim āghnan
saṃdaṣṭa oṣṭhaḥ nṛtyati vādayan iva
tatas tu amarṣī krodha saṃdīpta netraḥ
vātātmajaḥ pāṇinā pāṇim ārchat
bhīmaḥ bravīt arjunam satya saṃdham
amarṣitaḥ niḥśvasam jāta manyuḥ
roṣāt pradīptaḥ su mahān vimarde
bhīmaḥ tatas krudhyat adīna sattvaḥ
pāṇim sa pāṇau vinipiṣya roṣāt
amarṣitaḥ vākyam uvāca pārtham
katham nu pāpaḥ yam apeta dharmaḥ
sūta ātmajaḥ samare prasahya
pāñcālānām yodha mukhyān anekān
nijaghnivān tava jiṣṇo samakṣam
pūrvam daityaiḥ ajitam kālakeyaiḥ
sākṣāt sthāṇoḥ bāhu saṃsparśam etya
katham nu tvām sūtaputraḥ kirīṭin
mahā iṣubhiḥ daśabhiḥ avidhyat agre
tvayā kṣiptān ca agrasat bāṇa saṃghān
āścaryam etat pratibhāti me
kṛṣṇa a parikleśam anusmara tvam
yathā abravīt ṣaṇḍhatilān sma vācaḥ
vācaḥ su tīkṣṇa asthi bhidaḥ manojñāḥ
sūta ātmajaḥ yam gata bhīḥ durātmā
saṃsmṛtya sarvam tat iha adya pāpam
jahi āśu karṇam yudhi savyasācin
kasmāt upekṣām kuruṣe kirīṭin
upekṣitum na ayam iha adya kālaḥ
yayā dhṛtyā sarva bhūtāni ajaiṣīḥ
grāsam dadat vahnaye khāṇḍave tvam
tayā dhṛtyā sūtaputram jahi tvam
aham vā enam gadayā pothayiṣye
sametya pārtham sa nṛśaṃsa vādī
jīvan na ayam yāsyati kāla pakvaḥ
athā bravīt vāsudevaḥ pi pārtham
dṛṣṭvā ratheṣūn pratihanyamānān
amīmṛdat sarvathā te dya karṇo

original: hy astrair astrāṇi kim idaṃ kirīṭin
analyzed: hi astraiḥ astrāṇi kim idam kirīṭin
sa vīra kim muhyasi na avadhīyase
nadanti ete kuravaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ
karṇam puraskṛtya viduḥ hi sarve
tvad astram astraiḥ vinipātyamānam
yayā dhṛtyā nihatam tāmasa astram
yuge yuge rākṣasāḥ ca api ghorāḥ
dambhodbhavāḥ ca asurāḥ ca āhaveṣu
tayā dhṛtyā tvam jahi sūtaputram
darpa utsiktam vīryam antam kirīṭin
karṇam samāsādya ripu pramāthin
pārtha āhave vyaktam astram samartham
anena vā asya kṣura neminā adya
saṃchinddhi mūrdhānam areḥ prasahya
mayā nisṛṣṭena sudarśanena
vajreṇa śakraḥ namuceḥ iva areḥ
kirāta rūpī bhagavān yayā ca
tvayā mahatyā paritoṣitaḥ bhūt

original: 08,065.020c tāṃ tvaṃ dhṛtiṃ vīra punar gṛhītvā;
analyzed: tām tvam dhṛtim vīra punar gṛhītvā
saha anubandham jahi sūtaputram
tatas mahīm sāgara mekhalām tvam
sa pattanām grāmavatīm samṛddhām
prayaccha rājñe nihata ari saṃghām
yaśaḥ ca pārtha atulam āpnuhi tvam
saḥ evam uktaḥ tibalaḥ mahātmā
cakāra buddhim hi vadhāya sauteḥ
karṇam puraskṛtya nadanti sarve
tava astram urvyām pratihatya vīrāḥ
kuru prayatnam bharata pravīra
dravanti amī sṛñjaya somakāḥ ca
dṛṣṭvā ca karṇam samare prahṛṣṭam
tvām ca api dṛṣṭvā parihīyamānam
saṃcoditaḥ bhīma janārdanābhyām
smṛtvā tadā ātmānam avekṣya sattvam
mahātmanaḥ ca āgamane viditvā
prayojanam keśavam iti uvāca
prāduṣkaromi eṣa mahā astram ugram
śivāya lokasya vadhāya sauteḥ
tat me nujānātu bhavān surāḥ ca
brahmā bhavaḥ brahma vidaḥ ca sarve
iti sma uktvā pāṇḍavaḥ savyasācī
namaskṛtvā brahmaṇe saḥ mita ātmā
iti ūcivān brāhmam asahyam astram
prāduścakre manasā saṃvidheyam
tat asya hatvā virarāja karṇo
muktvā śarān meghaḥ iva ambu dhārāḥ
samīkṣya karṇena kirīṭinaḥ tu
tathā āji madhye vihitam tat astram
tatas marṣī balavān krodha dīptaḥ
bhīmaḥ bravīt arjunam satya saṃdham
nanu tu āhuḥ veditāram mahā astram
brāhmam vidheyam paramam janāḥ tat
punar yukta astram abhitas kirīṭin
iti sma uktaḥ yojayat savyasācī

original: 08,065.024c tato diśaś ca pradiśaś ca sarvāḥ;
analyzed: tatas diśaḥ ca pradiśaḥ ca sarvāḥ
samāvṛṇot sāyakaiḥ bhūri tejāḥ
gāṇḍīva muktaiḥ bhujagaiḥ iva ugraiḥ
divākara aṃśu pratimaiḥ jvaladbhiḥ
sasarja bāṇān bharata ṛṣabhaḥ u pi
śataṃśatān ekavat āśu vegān
prācchādayan karṇa ratham kṣaṇena
tatas ca śūlāni para svadhāni
cakrāṇi nārāca śatāni ca eva
niścakramuḥ ghoratarāṇi yodhāḥ
tatas nyahanyanta samantataḥ pi
chinnam śiraḥ kasya cit āji madhye
papāta yodhasya parasya kāyāt
bhayena saḥ pi āśu papāta bhūmau
anyaḥ pranaṣṭaḥ patitam vilokya
anyasya sa asiḥ nipapāta
yodhasya bāhuḥ kari hasta tulyaḥ
anyasya savyaḥ saha carmaṇā ca
kṣura prakṛttaḥ patitaḥ dharaṇyām
evam samastān api yodha mukhyān
vidhvaṃsayām āsa kirīṭamālī
śaraiḥ śarīra anta karaiḥ su ghoraiḥ
dauryodhanam sainyam aśeṣam eva
vaikartanena api tathā āji madhye
sahasraśas bāṇa gaṇāḥ visṛṣṭāḥ
te ghoṣiṇaḥ pāṇḍavam abhyupeyuḥ
parjanya muktāḥ iva vāri dhārāḥ
sa bhīmasenam ca janārdanam ca
kirīṭinam ca api amanuṣya karmā
tribhiḥ tribhiḥ bhīmabalaḥ nihatya
nanāda ghoram mahatā svareṇa
sa karṇa bāṇa abhihataḥ kirīṭī
bhīmam tathā prekṣya janārdanam ca
amṛṣyamāṇaḥ punar eva pārthaḥ
śarān daśa aṣṭau ca
suṣeṇam ekena śareṇa viddhvā
śalyam caturbhiḥ tribhiḥ eva karṇam
tatas su muktaiḥ daśabhiḥ jaghāna
sabhāpatim kāñcana varma naddham
sa rāja putraḥ viśirāḥ vibāhuḥ
vivāji sūtaḥ vidhanuḥ viketuḥ
tatas ratha agrāt apatat prabhagnaḥ
paraśvadhaiḥ śālaḥ iva abhikṛttaḥ

original: 08,065.030a punaś ca karṇaṃ tribhir aṣṭabhiś ca;
analyzed: punar ca karṇam tribhiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ ca
dvābhyām caturbhiḥ daśabhiḥ ca viddhvā
catuḥśatān dviradān sa āyudhīyān
hatvā rathān aṣṭaśatam jaghāna

original: 08,065.030e sahasram aśvāṃś ca punaś ca sādīn;
analyzed: sahasram aśvān ca punar ca sādīn
aṣṭau sahasrāṇi ca pattivīrān
karṇam sa sūtam sa ratha aśva ketum
adṛśyam añjaḥ gatibhiḥ ca cakre
krośan kuravaḥ vadhyamānā
dhanaṃjayena ādhirathim samantāt
muñca abhividdhya arjunam āśu karṇa
bāṇaiḥ purā hanti kurūn samagrān
sa coditaḥ sarva yatnena karṇo
mumoca bāṇān su bahūn abhīkṣṇam
te pāṇḍu pāñcāla gaṇān nijaghnuḥ
marma chidaḥ śoṇita māṃsa digdhāḥ
tau uttamau sarva dhanurdharāṇām
mahā balau sarva sapatna sāhau
nijaghnatuḥ ca āhita sainyam ugrau
anyonyam api astra vidau mahā astraiḥ
atha upayātaḥ tvaritaḥ didṛkṣuḥ
mantra auṣadhābhyām virujaḥ viśalyaḥ
kṛtaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ bhiṣajām variṣṭhaiḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tatra suvarṇa varmā
tatra upayātam yudhi dharmarājam
dṛṣṭvā mudā sarva bhūtāni anandan
rāhoḥ vimuktam vimalam samagram
candram yathā eva abhyuditam tathā eva
aṣṭāṅga vidyā āśramam udvahadbhiḥ
ābaddha paṭṭaḥ vraṇa lāghavena
yathā sureśaḥ ditijaiḥ kṣata aṅgaḥ
dṛṣṭvā āji mukhyau atha yudhyamānau
didṛkṣavaḥ śūra varau ari ghnau

original: 08,065.031c karṇaṃ ca pārthaṃ ca niyamya vāhān;
analyzed: karṇam ca pārtham ca niyamya vāhān
kha sthāḥ mahī sthāḥ ca jana avatasthuḥ

su mukta bāṇaḥ tumulaḥ babhūva
ghnatoḥ tathā anyonyam iṣu pravā ekaiḥ
dhanaṃjayasya ādhiratheḥ ca rājan
tatas dhanuḥ jyā sahasā atikṛṣṭā
su ghoṣam ācchidyata pāṇḍavasya
tasmin kṣaṇe sūtaputraḥ tu pārtham
samācinot kṣudrakāṇām śatena
nirmukta sarpa pratimaiḥ ca tīkṣṇaiḥ
taila pradhautaiḥ khaga patra vājaiḥ
ṣaṣṭyā nārācaiḥ vāsudevam bibheda
tad antaram somakāḥ prādravanta
pūṣa ātmajaḥ marmasu nirbibheda
marut sutam ca ayutaśas śara agraiḥ

original: 08,065.033d*1066_03 kṛṣṇaṃ ca pārthaṃ ca tathā dhvajaṃ ca
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca pārtham ca tathā dhvajam ca

prācchādayan te niśitaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ

āgacchataḥ tān viśikhaiḥ anekaiḥ
vyaṣṭambhayat sūtaputraḥ kṛtāstraḥ
taiḥ astam astram vinihatya sarvam
jaghāna teṣām ratha vāji nāgān
tathā tu sainya pravarān ca rājan
abhyardayat mārgaṇaiḥ sūtaputraḥ
te bhinna dehāḥ vyasavaḥ nipetuḥ
karṇa iṣubhiḥ bhūmi tale stanantaḥ
kruddhena siṃhena yathā aśva yūthyā
mahā balā bhīma balena tadvat
punar ca pāñcāla varāḥ tathā anye
tad antaram karṇa dhanaṃjayābhyām
praskandantaḥ balinaḥ sādhu muktaiḥ
karṇena bāṇaiḥ nihatāḥ prasahya
jayam tu matvā vipulam tvadīyāḥ
talān nijaghnuḥ siṃhanādān ca neduḥ

original: 08,065.033d*1067_19 sarve hy amanyanta vaśe kṛtau tau
analyzed: sarve hi amanyanta vaśe kṛtau tau
karṇena kṛṣṇau iti te vineduḥ
tatas nava jyām su dṛḍhām kirīṭī
sva bāhu vikṣepaṇa jām pragṛhya
samādade gāṇḍive kṣiprakārī
nimeṣa mātreṇa mahā dhanuṣmān
jyā chedanam jyā vidhānam ca tasya
na eva avabudhyat sūtaputraḥ laghu tvāt
pārthasya saṃkhye dviṣatām nihantuḥ
tat adbhūtam tatra babhūva rājan
tatas dhanuḥ jyām avadhamya śīghram
śarān astān ādhiratheḥ vidhamya
pārthaḥ pi tām jyām avadhāya tūrṇam
śarāsana jyām ādhiratheḥ vidhamya
su saṃrabdhaḥ karṇa śara kṣata aṅgaḥ
raṇe pārthaḥ somakān pratyagṛhṇāt
jyām ca anumṛjya abhyahanat talatre
bāṇa andhakāram tu akarot kṣaṇena

original: 08,065.034d*1070_03 śalyaṃ ca karṇaṃ ca kurūṃś ca sarvān
analyzed: śalyam ca karṇam ca kurūn ca sarvān
bāṇaiḥ avidhyat yugapad kirīṭī
na pakṣiṇaḥ saṃpatanti antarikṣe
kṣepīyasā astreṇa kṛte ndhakāre
vāyuḥ viyat sthaiḥ amaraiḥ sametya
vyuvāha bāṇān avalokayadbhiḥ
śalyam ca pārthaḥ daśabhiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
bhṛśam tanutre prahasan avidhyat
tatas karṇam dvādaśabhiḥ su muktaiḥ
viddhvā punar saptabhiḥ abhyavidhyat
sa pārtha bāṇāsana vega nunnaiḥ
dṛḍha āhataḥ patribhiḥ ugra vegaiḥ
vibhinna gātraḥ kṣataja ukṣita aṅgaḥ
karṇaḥ babhau rudraḥ iva ātata iṣuḥ
śmaśāna madhye
raudre muhūrte rudhira ārdra gātraḥ
tatas tribhiḥ ca tridaśādhipa upamam
śaraiḥ bibheda ādhirathiḥ dhanaṃjayam
śarān tu pañca jvalitān iva uragān
āsa jighāṃsuḥ acyute
te varma bhittvā puruṣottamasya
suvarṇa citram nyapatan su muktāḥ
vegena gām āviviśuḥ su vegāḥ
snātvā ca karṇa abhimukhāḥ pratīyuḥ
tān pañca bhallaiḥ tvaritaiḥ su muktaiḥ
tridhā tridhā ekaikam atha uccakarta
dhanaṃjayaḥ te nyapatan pṛthivyām
mahā ahayaḥ takṣaka putra pakṣāḥ
tatas prajajvāla kirīṭamālī
krodhena kakṣam pradahan iva agniḥ
tathā vinunna aṅgam avekṣya kṛṣṇam
sarpa iṣubhiḥ karṇa bhuja prasṛṣṭaiḥ
sa karṇam ākarṇa vikṛṣṭa sṛṣṭaiḥ
śaraiḥ śarīra anta karaiḥ jvaladbhiḥ
marmasu avidhyat sa cacāla duḥkhāt
dhairyāt tu tasthau atimātra dhairyaḥ
prāduścakāra atha śarān mahātmā
deham vicinvan iva sūtajasya
śarāḥ tu te kāñcana citra puṅkhāḥ
saṃpetuḥ urvyām śataśas mahāntaḥ
tatas śara oghaiḥ pradiśaḥ diśaḥ ca
raviprabhā karṇa rathaḥ ca rājan
adṛśyaḥ āsīt kupite dhanaṃjaye
tuṣāra nīhāra vṛtam yathā nabhaḥ
sa cakrarakṣān atha pādarakṣān
puraḥsarān pṛṣṭhagopān ca sarvān
bhītāḥ dravanti sma nihanyamānā
mahā iṣubhiḥ pārtha kara praṇunnaiḥ
tatas rjunaḥ vai bharata pravīraḥ
mahā anubhāvaḥ samare nihantā
duryodhanena anumatān ari ghnān
samuccitān su rathān sāra bhūtān
dvi sāhasrān samare savyasācī
kuru pravīrān ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇām
kṣaṇena sarvān sa ratha aśva sūtān
nināya rājan kṣayam eka vīraḥ
atha apalāyanta vihāya karṇam
tava ātmajāḥ kuravaḥ ca avaśiṣṭāḥ
hatān avākīrya śara kṣatān ca
lālapyamānān tanayān pitṝn ca
sarve praṇeśuḥ kuravaḥ vihīnāḥ
pārtha iṣubhiḥ saṃparitapyamānāḥ
suyodhanena atha punar variṣṭhāḥ
pracoditāḥ karṇa ratha anuyāne
bhoḥ kṣatriyāḥ śūratamāḥ ca sarve

original: 08,065.044d*1076_06 kṣātre ca dharme niratāḥ stha yūyam
analyzed: kṣātre ca dharme niratāḥ stha yūyam
na yukta rūpam bhavatām samīpāt
palāyanam karṇam abhiprahāya
tava ātmajena api tathā ucyamānāḥ
pārtha iṣubhiḥ saṃparitapyamānāḥ
na eva avatiṣṭhanta bhayāt vivarṇāḥ
kṣaṇena naṣṭāḥ pradiśaḥ diśaḥ ca
sa sarvatas prekṣya diśaḥ viśūnyā
bhaya avadīrṇaiḥ kurubhiḥ vihīnaḥ
na vivyathe bhārata tatra karṇaḥ
pratīpam eva arjunam abhyadhāvat
mahā rathaḥ sūtaputraḥ tathā api
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
tatas upayātāḥ śara pāta mātram
avasthitāḥ kuravaḥ bhinna senāḥ
vidyut prakāśam dadṛśuḥ samantāt
dhanaṃjaya astram samudīryamāṇam
tat arjuna astram grasate sma vīrān
viyat tathā ākāśam ananta ghoṣam
kruddhena pārthena tadā āśu sṛṣṭam
vadhāya karṇasya mahā vimarde
karṇaḥ su ghora iṣvasanam dṛḍha jyam
visphārayitvā visṛjam śara oghān
udīryamāṇam sma kurūn dahantam
suvarṇa puṅkhaiḥ iṣubhiḥ mahātmā
rāmāt upāttena mahā mahimnā
ātharvaṇena ari vināśanena
tat arjuna astram vyadhamat dahantam
pārtham ca bāṇaiḥ niśitaiḥ nijaghne
tatas vimardaḥ su mahān babhūva
tasya arjunasya ādhiratheḥ ca rājan
anyonyam āsādayatoḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
viṣāṇa ghātaiḥ dvipayoḥ iva ugraiḥ
tatas stra saṃghāta samāvṛtam tadā
babhūva rājan tumulam raṇa ajiram
tat karṇa pārthau śara vṛṣṭi saṃghaiḥ
nirantaram cakratuḥ ambaram tadā
tat bāṇa jāla eka mayam mahā astram
sarve drākṣuḥ kuravaḥ somakāḥ ca

original: 08,066.004d*1079_07 nānyaṃ ca bhūtaṃ dadṛśus tadā te
analyzed: na anyam ca bhūtam dadṛśuḥ tadā te
bāṇa andhakāre tumule ca tasmin
tatas tu tau vai puruṣa pravīrau
rājan varau sarva dhanurdharāṇām
tyaktvā ātma dehau samare ti ghore
prāpta śramau śatru durāsadau hi
dṛṣṭvā tu tau saṃprati saṃprayuktau
parasparam chidra niviṣṭa dṛṣṭī
deva ṛṣi gandharva gaṇāḥ sa yakṣāḥ
saṃtuṣṭuvuḥ tau pitaraḥ ca hṛṣṭāḥ
tau saṃdadhānau aniśam sma rājan
samasyantau ca api śarān anekān
saṃdarśayantau yudhi mārgān vicitrān
dhanurdharāṇām pravarau kṛtāstrau
tayoḥ evam yudhyatoḥ āji madhye
sūta ātmajaḥ bhūt adhikaḥ kadā cit

original: 08,066.004d@039_0007 pārthaḥ kadā cit tv adhikaḥ kirīṭī
analyzed: pārthaḥ kadā cit tu adhikaḥ kirīṭī
vīrya astra samyak bala lāghavaiḥ tu
dṛṣṭvā tatas tam yudhi saṃprahāram
parasparasya antara prekṣiṇaḥ ye
ghoram tadā durviṣaham raṇe
yodhāḥ sarve vismayam abhyagacchan
tatas tha bhūtāni antarikṣe sthitāni
karṇa arjunau tau praśaśaṃsuḥ narendra

original: 08,066.004d@039_0015 bhoḥ karṇa sādhv arjuna sādhu ceti
analyzed: bhoḥ karṇa sādhu arjuna sādhu ca iti
hṛṣṭāḥ procuḥ saṃghaśas prītimantaḥ
tasmin vimarde ratha vāji nāgāḥ
padāti saṃghāḥ vasudhām vyakampayan
tatas tu pātāla tale śayānaḥ
nāgaḥ śvasenaḥ kṛta vairaḥ rjunena
rājan tadā khāṇḍava dāha muktaḥ
kṛtvā su vegam vasudhā tala sthaḥ
athā utpapāta ūrdhva gatiḥ javena
saṃdṛśya karṇa arjunayoḥ vimardam
ayam hi kālaḥ sya durātmanaḥ vai
pārthasya vaira pratiyātanāya
saṃcintya tūṇam praviveśa ca eva
karṇasya rājam śara rūpa dhārī
tatas stra saṃghāta samākulam tadā
babhūva jālam vitata aṃśu jālam
tat karṇa pārthau śara saṃgha vṛṣṭibhiḥ
nirantaram cakratuḥ ambaram tadā
tad bāṇa jāla eka mayam mahāntam
sarve trasan kuravaḥ somakāḥ ca

original: 08,066.004d@040_0019 nānyat kiṃ cid dadṛśuḥ saṃpatad vai
analyzed: na anyat kim cit dadṛśuḥ saṃpatat vai
bāṇa andhakāre tumule timātram
tatas tau puruṣa vyāghrau sarva loka dhanuḥ dharau
tyakta prāṇau raṇe vīrau yuddha śramam upāgatau
samutkṣepaiḥ vīkṣamāṇau siktau candana vāriṇā
sa tāla vyajanaiḥ divyaiḥ divisthaiḥ apsaraḥ gaṇaiḥ

original: 08,066.004d@040_0026 karṇas tu pārthaṃ na viśeṣayad yadā
analyzed: karṇaḥ tu pārtham na viśeṣayat yadā
dṛḍham ca pārthena śaraiḥ nipīḍitaḥ
tatas sa karṇaḥ śara vikṣata aṅgo
manaḥ dadhe hi eka śayasya tasya
tatas ripu ghnam samadhatta karṇaḥ
su saṃśitam sarpa mukham jvalantam
raudram śaram saṃyati su pradhautam
pārtha artham atyartha cirāya guptam
sadā arcitam candana cūrṇa śāyinam
suvarṇa nālī śayanam mahā viṣam
ākarṇapūrṇam pravikṛṣya karṇaḥ
pārtha unmukham saṃdadhe tigmamanyum
pradīptam airāvata vaṃśa saṃbhavam
śiraḥ jihīrṣuḥ yudhi phalgunasya
mumoca śīghram sa ripu pramāthī
tatas prajajvāla diśaḥ nabhaḥ ca
ulkāḥ ca ghorāḥ sahasā nipetuḥ
tasmin tu nāge dhanuṣi prayukte
hāhākṛtāḥ sarva lokāḥ sa śakrāḥ
na ca api tam bubudhe sūtaputraḥ
bāṇe praviṣṭam yoga balena nāgam
daśa śata nayanaḥ him dṛśya bāṇe praviṣṭam

original: 08,066.006d*1085_02 nihata iti suto me srastagātro babhūva
analyzed: nihataḥ iti sutaḥ me srasta gātraḥ babhūva

original: 08,066.006d*1085_04 tridaśapatim avocan mā vyadhiṣṭhā jaye śrīḥ
analyzed: tridaśa patim avocat mā vyadhiṣṭhāḥ jaye śrīḥ
sa sūtaputraḥ tam apāṅga deśe
avāk mukham saṃdhayati sma roṣāt
na tam sma jānāti mahā anubhāvam
apāṅga deśa abhiniviṣṭam ājau
tam abravīt madra rājaḥ mahātmā
vaikartanam prekṣya hi saṃhita iṣum

original: 08,066.007c na karṇa grīvām iṣur eṣa prāpsyate;
analyzed: na karṇa grīvām iṣuḥ eṣa prāpsyate
saṃlakṣya saṃdhatsva śaram śiraḥ ghnam
atha abravīt krodha saṃrakta netraḥ

original: 08,066.008c na saṃdhatte dviḥ śaraṃ śalya karṇo;
analyzed: na saṃdhatte dvis śaram śalya karṇo
na mādṛśāḥ śāṭhya yuktāḥ bhavanti
prāptasya pārthaḥ praṇatāḥ sva svāhāḥ
saṃsthāpya kṛṣṇena punar tadīyam sic
tathā evam uktvā visasarja tam śaram
balāhakam varṣa ghana abhipūjitam
hataḥ si vai phalgunaḥ iti avocat
tatas tvaran ūrjitam utsasarja
saṃdhīyamānam bhujagam dṛṣṭvā karṇena mādhavaḥ

original: 08,066.010c ākramya syandanaṃ padbhyāṃ balena balināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: ākramya syandanam padbhyām balena balinām varaḥ

original: 08,066.011a avagāḍhe rathe bhūmau jānubhyām agaman hayāḥ
analyzed: avagāḍhe rathe bhūmau jānubhyām agaman hayāḥ

original: 08,066.011c tataḥ śaraḥ so 'bhyahanat kirīṭaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: tatas śaraḥ saḥ bhyahanat kirīṭam tasya dhīmataḥ
sa sāyakaḥ karṇa bhuja abhisṛṣṭaḥ
hutāśana arka pratimaḥ su ghoraḥ
guṇa cyutaḥ prājvalat antarikṣe
kurvan sīmantam nabhasaḥ bhīma rūpaḥ

original: 08,066.011d*1088_05 taṃ prekṣya dīptaṃ yudhi mādhavas tu
analyzed: tam prekṣya dīptam yudhi mādhavaḥ tu
tvarā anvitaḥ kaṃsa ripuḥ sa līlam
padā viniṣpiṣya ratha uttamam tam
prāveśayat jagatīm kiṣku mātram

original: 08,066.011d*1088_09 kṣitiṃ gatā jānubhis te tu vāhās
analyzed: kṣitim gatāḥ jānubhiḥ te tu vāhāḥ
tatas śaraḥ saḥ bhyahanat kirīṭam
tam āpatantam jvalitam nirīkṣya
viyat gatam vṛṣṇi kula pravīraḥ
rathasya cakram sahasā nipīḍya
pañcāṅgulam majjayati sma vīraḥ
tatas ntarikṣe su mahān ninādaḥ
saṃpūjana artham madhusūdanasya
divyāḥ ca vācaḥ sahasā babhūvuḥ
divyāni puṣpāṇi atha siṃhanādāḥ
tasmin tathā vai dharaṇīm nimagne
rathe prayogāt madhusūdanasya
tatas śaraḥ saḥ bhyahanat kirīṭam
tasya indra dattam su dṛḍham ca dhīmataḥ
atha arjunasya uttama gātra bhūṣaṇam
viśrutam
bala astra sarga uttama yatna manyubhiḥ
śareṇa mūrdhnaḥ sa jahāra sūtajaḥ
divākara indu jvalana graha tviṣam
suvarṇa muktā maṇi jāla bhūṣitam
puraṃdara artham tapasā prayatnataḥ
svayam kṛtam yat bhuvanasya sūnunā
mahārha rūpam dviṣatām bhayaṃkaram
vibhāti ca atyartha sukham sugandhi tat
nijaghnuṣe deva ripūn sureśvaraḥ
svayam dadau yat su manāḥ kirīṭine
pināka pāśa aśani sāyaka uttamaiḥ
kṣatam nayat rudra gaṇaiḥ pinākinā
sahāyavān pāvaka saṃnibhaiḥ śaraiḥ
sura uttamaiḥ api aviṣahyam arditum
prasahya nāgena jahāra yat vṛṣaḥ
ciram dhṛtena aditinā iha rājan
sa duṣṭa bhāvaḥ vitatha pratijñaḥ
kirīṭam abhyāhanat arjunasya
viśuddha jāmbūnada ratna bhūṣitam
pārtha uttamāṅgāt aharat tarasvī
tat hema jāla avatatam su ghoṣam
jājvalyamānam nipapāta bhūmau
tat uttama iṣūn mathitam viṣa agninā
pradīptam arciṣmat abhikṣiti priyam
papāta pārthasya kirīṭam uttamam
divākaraḥ u stāt iva parvatāt jvalan
tatas kirīṭam bahu ratna maṇḍitam
jahāra nāgaḥ rjuna mūrdhataḥ balāt
gireḥ su jāta aṅkura puṣpita drumam
mahā indra vajraḥ śikharam yathā uttamam
mahī viyat dyauḥ salilāni vāyunā
yathā vibhinnāni vibhānti bhārata
tathā eva śabdaḥ bhuvaneṣu abhūt tadā
janāḥ vyavasyan vyathitāḥ ca caskhaluḥ
tatas samudgrathya sitena vāsasā
sva mūrdha jāna vyathitaḥ sthitaḥ rjunaḥ
vinā kirīṭam śuśubhe sa pārthaḥ
śyāmaḥ yuvā śailaḥ iva asta śṛṅgaḥ
vibhāti saṃpūrṇa marīci bhāsvatā
śiraḥ gatena udaya parvataḥ yathā
tatas rjunaḥ karṇam avakra gaiḥ navaiḥ
suvarṇa puṅkhaiḥ su dṛḍhaiḥ ayasmayaiḥ
yama agni daṇḍa pratimaiḥ stanāntare
parābhinat krauñcam iva adrim agnijaḥ
tatas śarāvāpam apāsya sūtajaḥ
dhanuḥ ca tat śakra śarāsana upamam
tatāpa tasthau na mumoha caskhale

original: 08,066.019d@041_0008 dṛḍhāhataḥ saṃś ca punas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: dṛḍha āhataḥ san ca punar tatas tatas

original: 08,066.019d@041_0009 na hy arjunas taṃ vyasane tadeyivān

original: 08,066.019d*1096_04 gokarṇāsanamardanaś ca na yayāv aprāpya mṛtyor vaśam
analyzed: gokarṇa āsana mardanaḥ ca na yayau a prāpya mṛtyoḥ vaśam
balāhakaḥ karṇa bhuja īritaḥ

kirīṭam ākṛṣya tathā arjunasya
mahā uragaḥ kṛta vairaḥ sa tūrṇam

vyāvṛtya tasmāt ca tatas kirīṭāt

original: 08,066.020d*1100_07 samīkṣya māṃ muñca raṇe tvam āśu
analyzed: samīkṣya mām muñca raṇe tvam āśu

kṛṣṇa adya mātuḥ vadha jāta vairam
nāgaḥ
nāgaḥ smi śvetaḥ kṛta vairaḥ rjunena

original: 08,069.043d*1224_24 pāṇḍavāś ca jayaṃ prāptā nāśitāś cāpi śatravaḥ

original: 08,069.043d*1224_30 tvayā nāthena govinda nāthavanto vayaṃ yudhi

original: 08,069.043d*1224_38 arhate ca bhavān vaktuṃ priyaṃ nityaṃ hi maddhitam

vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 08,069.043d*1224_62 tatas tūrṇaṃ tu viduras taṃ nṛpaṃ saṃjayas tathā

original: 08,069.043d*1224_63 paryāśvāsayatāṃ caitāv ubhāv eva tu bhūmipam

original: 08,069.043d*1224_65 sa daivaṃ paramaṃ mene bhavitavyaṃ ca tat tathā

analyzed: punar ca śibiram prāptaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ bharata ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 08,069.043d*1228_02 yat kṛtvā tu ca kartavyaṃ sukhāsīnaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
